resources.string: Allows view and edit of revoked permissions. Not for use by normal applications.
Allows read and write for revoked permissions. Not for use by normal applications.
Allows accessing the theme manager service. Not for use by normal applications.
Allows an application to set/reset themes. Not for use by normal applications.
Allows the app to intercept an outgoing SMS. Malicious apps may use this to prevent outgoing SMS messages.
